SEARCH
Package hospital

Class Hospital

java.lang.Object
hospital.Hospital
public class Hospital extends Object
Represents a hospital. It manages a set of rooms, people, and events that occur in the hospital. It also contains a map of the hospital and methods to interact with it. The hospital detect contacts between people and rooms within a specified date range. The hospital find the closest exit given a room. The hospital print a visual representation of the map using a graphical interface. The hospital detect all people who had contact with a room within a specified date range. The hospital detect all people who had contact with a person within a specified date range.

    • Hospital

      public Hospital()
      Default constructor that initializes the hospital with an empty map, rooms, people, and events. It also initializes the list of edges.

    • hadContactWithIndividual

      public collections.lists.UnorderedListADT<Person> hadContactWithIndividual(int id, LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
      Detects contacts of a person within a specified date range.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the person to check contacts for.
      from - The start of the date range.
      to - The end of the date range.
      Returns:
      A list of IDs of people who were in the same room within the specified time frame.

    • hadContactWithRoom
